items.title: ICBA Payments and Visa Renew Partnership Supporting Community Bank Payments
items.description: WASHINGTON, July 16, 2025--ICBA Payments and Visa today announced the renewal of their four-decade relationship to support community banks with modern payment tools.

items.title: More Transactions, Less Interest: Can Affirm Still Win BNPL?
items.description: AFRM's transactions surge 46% in the third quarter of fiscal 2025 as it leans into 0% APR loans, aiming to offset thinner margins with higher volume.

items.title: Why Do Merchants Trust Mastercard in a Risky Digital World?
items.description: MA's AI-driven fraud tools, partnerships and cybersecurity investments help merchants stay secure in the digital world.
